Hi there, I'm Ziyu Liu!

A life-long student, also an associate researcher at China Agricultural University, Informatics Research Center.

I recieved a bachelor degree in physics and a Ph.D. in education, while I ended up with being a researcher mainly focusing on NLP and Knowledge Management.

Have to say... this is life. Right?

This is my personal website and blog, to keep records and maintain my project, also to track my daily life.
